name: Magna (Greenstack)
description:
Help Magna protect the World Crystals by using her quake magic to send enemies flying and destroy the invading Warp Crystals! But be careful - when in a bind, the Warp Crystals summon enemies that get stronger the weaker the crystal they've come from is.

Developed using Love 11.4, but it should work with any version of Love > 11.2.

Note: The zip folder contains the exact same executable as was uploaded before the jam submission deadline and is the same game as is found in the .love file. The only difference is that it has the .dlls required to run the game packaged with it.

Controls:

  • Move: WASD
  • Create Earthquake: X

It's too bad I got sick the day before the game was due lol

Credits:

  • GreenstackJ: Code, artwork, pretty much everything
  • Tesselode: Baton, Cartographer libraries
  • Brian Sarfati: Brinevector library
  • Josh Perry: Peachy library (for handling animations)
  • Kikito: Gamera library

Software used:

  • Aseprite
  • Adobe Illustrator CS4
  • Visual Studio Code
